Bruce K Rubin

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/1776964018567388
  • Última atualização do currículo em 25/02/2014

Jessie Ball duPont Distinguished Professor and Chair, Department of Pediatrics; Professor of Biomedical Engineering; Adjunct Professor of Physiology and Biophysics; Virginia Commonwealth University; Physician in Chief, Children s Hospital of Richmond at VCU. Research areas: airway inflammation and immune modulation, aerosol therapy, medical and tissue engineering, severe asthma. (Texto informado pelo autor)
